home.comfortableDescription: Ðò Ekpe tokpɔn fífá mɛ, ɖó gǎn kpo xu kpo ɖò Cotonou. Xwé mǐtɔn lɛ nyí ewu bo ɖó jiɖe nú xwédo lɛ kpo azɔ̌watɔ́ lɛ kpo.
home.secureDesc: Agbahwlɛn kpo ewu 24/24 kpo nú fífá towe.
home.nearBeachDesc: Ðó gǎn kpɛví ɖé dó Atlantiki xu ɖagbe ɔ.
home.reliablePowerDesc: Groupe électrogène kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo bo nɔ xwedó.
home.findHomeDesc: Hwenu gǎn kpo hwenu kpɛví kpo ɖè. Kpɔ́n xwé lɛ bo byɔ ɛntɛnɛti jí egbè.
home.locationDesc: Tokpɔn ɖé wɛ bo ɖó ali ɖagbe yì Cotonou, asi, wemaxɔ, kpo xu kpo. Fí ɖagbe nú gbɛzán.

footer.aboutText: Xwé ewu kpo agbahwlɛn kpo ɖò Ekpe, Benɛ. Hwenu gǎn kpo hwenu kpɛví kpo ɖè.

login.tenantHint: Nú xwétɔ́ towe ko zé we dó locataire mɛ hǔn, zán email ɖokpo ɔ. È na zɔn we dó xwé towe.
login.noAccount: Kɔntu ɖé ǎ. Wlǎn nyikɔ hwɛ̌.
login.passwordTooShort: Xósin ɖó na ɖó wekwín 6 ɖò kpɛví.
login.emailExists: Kɔntu ɖé tíìn ko. Byɔ mɛ.

listings.title: Xwé E Ðò Lɛ
listings.noUnits: Xwé ɖě ɖè ǎ dìn. Lɛkɔ wá kpɔ́n !

accessDenied.title: Gbɛ́ Ali
accessDenied.noTenantRecord: Mǐ mɔ locataire nú {{email}} ǎ. Ðɔ xó nú xwétɔ́ towe.
